name: Comfort Inn - Los Angeles / West Sunset Blvd.

reviews.text: It was a little disconcerting to come into the lobby and be greeted by the staff behind the security glass. I guess the neighborhood isn't great but they have taken every precaution to make it safe by installing security cams and secured parking. Although the carpeting in the hallways needs replaced, the rooms were very clean, updated, and roomy. The high speed internet access was great and very fast. The hotel even had an ethernet cable that I borrowed since I didn't remember to bring mine. (I'm actually using it to write this review!) Location is good - about 15 minutes from downtown and Hollywood and Universal. Hard to beat this hotel for the price!
reviews.title: Great!

reviews.text: We selected this hotel because on a budget trip which included Los Angeles, and we were plesantly surprised. Not only it was a very convenient solution, but also quite a plesant stay. I would only recomend it for a B/B sort of stay, but we had a nice and clean room, and the complimentary breakfast was better than expected: mostly carb based, but you can make your fresh waffle.
reviews.title: good budget choice.

reviews.text: Vending machines with anything from water and soda to hot pizza are available on the various floors.
reviews.title: Totally worth the price
Overall Nice Hotel
reviews.text: The hotel has a free gated parking space, but if you are stuck without a car you can catch the bus right in fron of the hotel which will take you to the nearest metro station in 10 minutes, down town in about 15 and even all the way to Santa Monica, going through West Hollywood and Beverly Hills.

Staying in LA on a budget is never easy, especially if you have a specific area where you need to be. This hotel is right in the Silverlake/Echo Park area, and is in a great central location to Hollywood and the 101. We ran into no traffic, and while my husband was working, I was able to enjoy the neighborhood. The hotel was clean, the staff was friendly and accommodating, and there was underground parking that was kept locked at night. There is available DSL and what looks like a decent Thai restaurant open late downstairs (I didn't try it). I would definitely stay here again. For a comfortable stay around $85, you can't go wrong.
reviews.title: Good Room, Good Location, Good Value
nice place
reviews.text: Hotel very spacious and clean, had fridge and microwave. Great breakfast with lots of options. Nice staff and very central location to many sights. Too far to walk to Hollywodd but short drive, not to many restraunts in the area. Free parking garage that always has plenty of space and limited access.

aka: Comfort Inn - Los Angeles / West Sunset Blvd. Hotel Los Angeles
